line_1: Wi' stocks out owre their shouther:
line_2: They roar an' cry a' throw'ther;

line_1: Their gun's a burden on their shouther;
line_2: They downa bide the stink o' powther;

line_1: Their gun's a burden on their shouther;
line_2: Their bauldest thought's a hank'ring swither,

line_1: Their gun's a burden on their shouther;
line_2: Till skelp — a shot — they're aff, a' throw'ther,
